command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&     ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/0/8/d/dataset_08de13d9-7b3b-4f47-8fc7-f1defdc44086.dat' infile &&         sample_fragment=`samtools view -c  infile  | awk '{s=$1} END {frac=s/20; print(frac > 1 ? 21803+1/frac : ".0")}'` &&  samtools view -@ $addthreads -h    -s ${sample_fragment}   -o outfile      infile
